sentences.en: A dry cough is the trumpeter of death.
A trumpeter sent out a warning blast.
A trumpeter swan glides across the surface of the Yellowstone River.
sentences.cn: 一只号手天鹅正游过黄石河的水面.

sentences.en: Rudolph leaned forward intently, gloriously battered by the music, his eyes glued on the Negro trumpeter.
sentences.cn: 鲁道夫急切地听着, 这音乐叫他大为倾倒,眼睛盯着那吹小号的黑人.

sentences.en: State funds and rich sea - Franklin also optimistic about the coming year to meet the trumpeter.
sentences.cn: 富国基金和国 海富兰克林 也是迎接乐观来年的吹鼓手.

sentences.en: The model was made by Trumpeter from Chinese mainland.
sentences.cn: 模型是由中国大陆的小号手出产.

sentences.en: The trumpeter taken prisoner A trumpeter was captured by his enemy in a battle.
sentences.cn: 号兵●在一场战争中,有个号兵被敌人抓获了.

sentences.en: The trumpeter taken prisonerstrumpeter was captured by his enemy in a battle.
sentences.cn: 在一场战争中,有个号兵被敌人抓获了.

words.tran_cn: 吹喇叭；发出喇叭般的声音

trans.tran_cn: 号手，号兵，小号吹奏者，吹鼓手
trans.tran_en: A trumpeter is someone who plays a trumpet
